long_description: Inspired by a Japanese Santoku chef's knife, the Freescape Camp Kitchen Knife from Gerber features a full fine-edge blade and full-tang construction of high-grade steel. 3.5-inch smooth (non-serrated) blade constructed of high-quality 7Cr17MoV steel features a modified sheepsfoot point and flat belly for accurate food prep. Full-tang construction ensures knife stands up to an impressive range of campsite duties beyond the kitchen, from cutting through cord to whittling marshmallow sticks. Super-grippy rubberized Freescape textured handle has green accents so it won't get lost in the shuffle. Non-folding, the knife can be washed at high temperatures in the dishwasher once you get home. Gerber Freescape Camp Kitchen Knife has a lanyard hole and comes with a durable sheath that can hang from a belt.
short_description: Inspired by a Japanese Santoku chef's knife, the Freescape Camp Kitchen Knife from Gerber features a full fine-edge blade and full-tang construction of high-grade steel.
